name: Alastor's Legacy
description:
In this card game, you play as the final boss of the game. Can you defeat the hero? Probably. But can you make the game a fun experience? We'll see...

You play the game with the mouse. Have fun.

Tools used:

Unity, Logic Pro, Stable Diffusion 1.5, Inkpunkv2, Real-ESRGAN, Procreate, GIMP, Final Cut, Computer
